name: Li'l Hatchling
description:
You're a newborn dinosaur abandoned by your mother. Fight through enemies and go through the perilous, unforgiving wilderness to find her. What will be your fate, or hers? Only time will tell.

Credits:

  • Made by Ethan Alcantara / Programmer, Game Designer, Artist
  • Instuctor: Graham Pezzuti

Platform/System:

  • Built in Gadot Engine
  • For Windows PC
